name: Racing Kings
description:
Racing kings driving simulation game brings a revolution to mobile car racing games. This game provides everything you want in a traffic racing game - exotic cars, detailed customizations, body decals, rims, different playing modes, multiplayer system and more. Download the game now, master driving as if you were in a car driving school and experience the thrill of racing through traffic.


Car Customization Options
---
Detailed car models
Customize vehicle body color
Tinted windows
Various modern rim styles
Cool decals for your vehicles
and much more!


Car Power Options
---
Upgrade max speed
Upgrade acceleration
Upgrade brakes
Upgrade handling


Game Modes - There are 4 popular racing modes available
---
One way traffic mode
Two traffic mode
Time attack mode - reach as far as you can and collect as many points as you can in a limited time frame
Free ride mode - don't want to collect points, just want to drive? Select this mode and drive as long as you want, no crashes or anything, just pure driving through traffic


Multiplayer
---
Bet the amount you want and try to beat other players while driving through traffic and see who reaches the finish line first


Unique Maps
---
Choose between 4 different maps
Forest map
Seaside town
Desert
Snow
